Package com.github.uberroot.ncjbot

This package contains the classes that form the core of NCJBot.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigManager.EventListener
    An interface that listens for configuration changes.
    RemoteNode.EventListener
    An interface to receive events that occur with a remote node.
    UnsafeObject<S>
    Represents an object in which direct access to untrusted code could have undesirable consequences, and to which a safe alternative or wrapper exists.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigManager
    This class is responsible for loading, maintaining, and retrieving configuration data.
    LocalNode
    This is the core of the NCJBot.
    RemoteJob
    This class provides access to LocalJobs running on remote nodes.
    RemoteNode
    This class is responsible for holding data about remote nodes and handling the underlying socket communication.
    ServerSessionHandler
    Handles communications from a client and closes the session when finished.
    ServerThread
    This class handles all incoming requests.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NodeState
    A enumeration type for the states of nodes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NCJBotException
    The root class for all NCJBot-specific exceptions.
    NodeStateException
    An exception that is thrown when a requested action on a node is unavailable due to its state.

Package com.github.uberroot.ncjbot Description

This package contains the classes that form the core of NCJBot.

Author:
Carter Waxman
